name: AI Landing Page Builder
descriptions: Devi AI Landing Page Builder is an innovative AI-driven platform that enables users to swiftly create and launch websites without the hassle of traditional design processes. With a focus on ease and speed, Devi streamlines the experience of designing, editing, and deploying websites with its advanced features.AI Design & Copy:Generate websites and landing pages in mere seconds using advanced AI design and content creation capabilitiesAnalytics & Insights:Gain a clear understanding of website performance and user interactions through integrated analyticsSEO Optimized & A/B Testing:Ensure the best visibility on search engines and optimize for conversions with built-in A/B testing toolsFree Image & Video Library:Access a vast library of images and videos, enhancing the visual appeal and engagement of your site

name: AI Poem Generator
descriptions: AI Poem Generator is an innovative tool that leverages AI to produce unique and captivating poetry based on a user’s inputs. The tool utilizes Natural Language Processing (NLP), machine learning algorithms, deep learning, and several text generation models to create poetry in various styles, offering a user-friendly experience for all, regardless of artistic or coding abilities.Prompt-Based AI Generation:Users can input specific themes or words, prompting the AI to craft personalized poems that are rich with users’ creative ideas.Customize Your Creations:Users can refine and adjust each verse to reflect their unique style and expression.Various Poem Styles:The tool offers different styles, including Haiku, Sonnet, Free Verse, and others, providing a versatile poetry creation experience.Different Poem Sizes:The AI Poem Generator caters to different needs and writing styles, offering options for short, medium, and long poems.

name: AI Signature Generator
descriptions: AI-Powered FREE Handwritten Signature Generator enables users to create a personalized digital signature with the help of AI-powered algorithms. With a simple 2-minute setup, users can generate a signature that truly reflects their individual style and seamlessly integrates into any digital context.AI Enhancement:Advanced AI algorithms refine and enhance the signature to create a polished and professional lookTransparent Background:Generated signatures come with a transparent background to allow for seamless integration into any digital documentWide Range of Use Cases:Simplify team meetings, automate reporting, create no-code dashboards, and manage personal productivityCompatibility:Generated signatures are compatible with a wide range of digital platforms and applications

name: Audit Landin Page
descriptions: Audit Landin Page is an AI-powered tool that leverages the insights of behavioral science, decision science, and psychology to optimize your landing page copy for better conversions. Here are its key features:Behavioral Science Insights:The tool provides insights from 200+ cognitive biases and behavioral sciences to enhance your landing page copy.Conversion Boost:It helps boost your landing page conversions by crafting compelling and persuasive messaging.Behavioral Effect Utilization:You can apply behavioral effects and cognitive biases like confirmation bias and social proof to influence your visitors positively.Cost-Effective:Audit Landin Page offers valuable insights at an affordable cost of just $2, making it accessible to marketers and makers.

name: Blue Strawberry
descriptions: Blue Strawberry is a powerful AI-assisted tool that simplifies social media marketing by generating creative content and scheduling posts. It turns your website and blog content into engaging social media posts, eliminating the time and effort typically spent on ‘social chores’.Content Generation:Transforms website, blogs and vlogs content into engaging social postsScheduling:Pre-schedules posts on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Pinterest to maintain a consistent online presenceReal-time tracking:Users can track the performance of their posts in real-time to gauge effectivenessFlexibility and Ease:Users can easily confirm their posting schedule, confirm hashtags, amend, replace, and approve all captions created by the AI

name: Create

name: Image upscaler AI
descriptions: ImageUpscalerAI is an AI-powered tool that enables users to quickly and easily upscale images with just a few clicks. With this tool, users can upscalre photos, cartoons, images, and more with the help of advanced artificial intelligence.Image Upscaling:Upscale photos, cartoons, images, and more with the help of advanced artificial intelligenceDrag and Drop:Easily upload images and drag and drop them directly into the toolFaces:Fix faces in images to make them look more realisticSubscription Plans:Choose from various subscription plans, with no conversion limit and unlimited image editing

name: Kapwing AI Video Generator
tags: Digital Marketing, Graphic Design, Video & Animation
descriptions: Kapwing AI allows users to generate and edit videos from text prompts. Equipped with features like automatic trimming, smart subtitling, and video enhancement abilities, this AI platform brings numerous capabilities right at your fingertips.AI Video Editing:Enhance, trim, and generate videos using the cutting-edge AI editing tool that allows users to create professional, high-quality content with ease.Text-Based Video Editor:Edit your videos by modifying the text transcript, allowing for precision and convenience in the editing process.AI Video Generation:Generate stylized summary videos about any topic for social media, create original images from text prompts, and convert long-form documents into video summaries.Smart Features:Utilize smart features like automated content trimming, background removal, text to speech, and automatic subtitle generation for a smoother, more efficient editing workflow.

name: Lightrail
descriptions: Lightrail alpha is a Universal AI Command Bar that simplifies software development by allowing users to pull data from running applications like code editors and web browsers to enhance the results of AI commands. Integrated with various applications, Lightrail alpha proposes code, navigates software, and creates files on behalf of the user.Contextual data extraction:Pull data from running applications like code editors and web browsers to enhance the results of AI commandsApplication interaction:Let AI commands interact with your applications by proposing code, navigating software, or creating filesExtensibility:Install Lightrail Tracks to add new commands and sources of context, or utilize the simple API to build your ownFree and open source:Lightrail alpha is available for free download on Linux and macOS

name: Lunchbreak AI
descriptions: Lunchbreak AI assists students in writing essays with the help of advanced AI that aids in researching and ensuring content is plagiarism-free. It saves hours of work, generates professional content backed by research, and guarantees all content appears authored by the human user, not AI.AI-powered Essay Writing:Use AI to research and generate high-quality, plagiarism-free essays in secondsTopic & Source Generation:The AI provides accurate, well-researched sources and topics to give essays depth and credibilityAI Detection & Humanization: The sophisticated model trained on over 40,000 student essays guarantees the content is undetectable by AI and reads coherently as written by a humanInteractive Process:Users can enter their essay details such as the topic, type, and length, choose generated sources, and humanize the text to make sure it comes out personalized and unique

name: Metricool

Users can schedule social media posts, automatically import and share social media content, organize posts into collections, and get detailed analytics of their social media performance.Social Media Scheduling:Offers an easy and quick solution to schedule months of social media content in minutesSocial Media Automation:Allows automatic import, sharing, and recycling of social media content from various sourcesSocial Media Management:Enables users to create their own social content, organize it into collections, and control its posting scheduleDetailed Analytics:Provides insightful analytics on social media performance, post history, and engagement growth to optimize social media strategies

name: Pacely
descriptions: Pacely is a project management tool that utilizes AI to streamline software development processes and save teams time in communication, documentation, and development. With an AI assistant that understands your code, Pacely generates real-time documentation, facilitates team collaboration, and provides intelligent bug analysis, all accessible through Slack integration.AI-powered documentation:Pacely’s AI assistant provides real-time documentation and guidance, reducing the need for manual explanation of system behavior and enabling faster onboarding processesEfficient organization system:Use stacks to break down backlogs into smaller, prioritized clusters of stories, making it easy to identify and focus on the highest priority tasksFlexible sprint management:Set start and end dates for sprints, with the option to easily move unfinished stories to the next sprint or backlogSeamless integrations:Integrate with GitHub to track commits and pull requests, and use Slack to receive updates and notifications from Pacely

name: Pontus
tags: AI Models, Data, Web & App Dev
descriptions: Pontus is an AI tool that makes it easier to build AI models with privacy in mind. It allows users to measure and manage risk, while also providing the ability to move faster in the development process.Smart Anonymization:Automatically detect and anonymize protected information according to GDPR and CPRA without removing personalization capabilitiesRapid Liability Audit:Intuitive dashboard to automatically identify all associated data sent to LLM providers for rapid compliance verificationPrivacy-Aware Caching:Save on cost without sacrificing privacy by securely caching data and reducing reliance on external servicesRole-Based Access Controls:Control access to pertinent data while interacting with LLM providers through role-based access controls

descriptions: UBOS is a low/no-code platform that allows users to build and deploy AI-powered applications quickly and easily.
